website_summaries.verdict: If you want a YETI that is very portable or you are on a budget, this cooler is worth a look.
pros: It's roomy, but light enough to be portable
The cooler weighs 4 pounds empty and can hold up to 20 pounds of ice along with eighteen 12-ounce drinks
cons: It does keep things cold for a couple of days, but cold retention is not as good as with larger YETI coolers

customer_reviews.title: Excited but then I used it.....
customer_reviews.text: I expected this cooler based on all of the hype to actually have ice last for more than a day. Inside of an apartment at 70 degrees a full 15 -20 lb bag of ice did not last over 24 hours. When opened, just a bunch of cold water. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for day trips on boat for snorkeling, heading to the beach for sun and play. I decided to keep ice in the bag from store and put it on the bottom of the cooler. Put all food and drinks in and covered with ice in bag I collected from my fridge. Saved the hassle of wading thru ice and water to get drinks and food. Everything was refrigerator cold all day long in 80 degree heat of Bahamas.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Keep drinks cold, zipper hard to open
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a Razor Run that we went on for 3 days. Because we had a 4 seater-side by side, we carried our cooler and our friends 2 Yeti coolers. They got really dirty but hosed off well. The zipper is hard to open and close, I dreaded getting a drink out so would always ask my husband to open it. By the end of the trip, both our friends Yetis zipper was split/broken. For the price you pay for these, that should never happen. So, in my opinion they are a bit over rated for their functionality. A subsequent cooler knock off would work fine for a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issue
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our son and the zipper broke within months :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ice melted within 24 hours, even in the cool Colorado mountains in the shade.. I could go on and on about the construction and the zipper but I won’t. I returned it, not worth the money or the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Yes for YETI
customer_reviews.text: This portable cooler is a beast. I love the tote design which is high enough for wine bottles to stand up in ice but low enough so that it comfortable stands up in the trunk of my car. In terms of durability and cooling, it's a YETI! You could run it over with the car and it would be fine. I've filled it with ice and left it on my roof deck all weekend. On Monday, there's still ice!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm G. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Greatest cooler we ever owned. Holds a full case of beer or 6 wine bottles. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy O.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: To those who read reviews and are worried about this product not being genuine: this product is sold by Yeti and is 100% authentic. Ours holds ice as suggested and is water proof as advertised. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Huge but can’t fit anything in it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a larger size but you can fit basically ice packs and nothing more. Super heavy. Zipper doesn’t work well. I’ve loved every yeti but this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We switched from Arctic...
customer_reviews.text: We bought an Arctic cooler less than a year ago. Was a little cheaper than YETI and you could tell why. Didn’t hold ice as long and the zipper broke after a few months. We finally got our refund from them and upgraded to the real deal. It’s been great having the YETI throughout this humid Chicago summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the hubs for Fathers Day. He loves it Does exactly what Yeti says!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: My cooler is less then 6 months old and the teeth on the zipper are moving and the zipper will not zip. I have tried to return it to Yeti and to the seller with no luck. NOT HAPPY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built like it's military grade equipment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most rugged cooler bag I have ever seen. Keep ice and sodas icy cold for over 24 hours. Finally took out leftover sodas and dumped ice. I have no idea how long the ice would have lasted. Days maybe?
customer_reviews.author: Code Slinger

customer_reviews.title: kept food and beer cold for days
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is worth every penny. We took it camping with us. Filled it before we left with about 2/3 bag of ice. Two days later when we got home and emptied it, there was still ice cubes at the bottom of it. Wild
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First impressions,  looks and performs great
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied! I bought this for the wife and her lifestyle. Fits her wine bottles and anything else she wants. I could have gone with a lesser product, but it’s worth it to give the wifey a brand name that now only performs, but also looks good when walking into a party. Lasted us 2 -3 days cold using ice packs
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks good, yet to be fully tested.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a gift and as such has yet to be used to fully rate the durability, sturdiness or leak proof qualities. It does look very sturdy, durable and has a great liner on the inside. When it was received however, I did note that it had a large ink mark on the Yeti lettering on one side as well as on the upper part of the cooler. Unfortunately it was not able to be gotten out. Doesn't interfere with function of product, just the clean look of it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Yeti Hopper Two
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased another portable Yeti cooler that had a top zip access point which proved to create a challenge in getting items in and out of it. This model has a side zip access point---same great durability and sturdiness and keeps all of your food and beverage items chilled for hours, easy in and out with your stored items.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this cooler. However, the opening is very difficult to manipulate. I guess I should have seen it coming but I didn’t really think about it. The opening is considerably smaller than the bag itself. It makes it difficult to keep the bag open and put things in it at the same time. But it does keep things cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong and keeps it all cold
customer_reviews.text: We love the soft cooler! very easy to take along even when it's packed full. It the past(with other brans) the zipper on the soft coolers can be tricky so Yeti provides you with some zipper lube just in case but the straight design helps keep any zipper popping from happening!
customer_reviews.author: rachael mohr

customer_reviews.title: It's works perfect, not so happy with the opening or this ...
customer_reviews.text: It's works perfect, not so happy with the opening or this zipper , it's hard to put items in the bag or take them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Armijo

customer_reviews.title: They love it except that the zipper isn’t on the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my parents. They love it except that the zipper isn’t on the top it is on the side. I assume this is for a better insulating seal. Giving it four stars for the zipper being a little sticky, though this will likely work itself out
customer_reviews.author: Engineertodayhiketomorrow

customer_reviews.title: This was a great Christmas gift it keeps every thing cold just like ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Christmas gift it keeps every thing cold just like they sat heavy duty sturdy great product It is worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bush

customer_reviews.title: Definitely spend the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best beach or camping cooler made. Keeps everything cold in Florida heat for the entire day at the beach and is easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: james hayhurst

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is so tight it is hard to get items in & out without scratching your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jo In AL

customer_reviews.title: YETI warranty and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soft cooler from Amazon in 2017. It was my favorite cooler ever. Recently the zipper failed, rendering the cooler useless. Devastation. This surprised me because the zipper and overall build quality of this cooler is outstanding. I called YETI after the warranty expired. No problem... they are sending me a brand new cooler, the M30 hopper. YETI is more expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, brought the 40 but it was way to big.
customer_reviews.author: Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband's birthday and he treats it like a special possession. He takes it everywhere. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KristinaKay

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: I just didn't care for the opening. It doesn't open wide enough to easily pack with drinks and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Redhawk44

customer_reviews.title: The best cooler, worth the cashola!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for boating! Doesn’t leak and holds a lot of food & drinks.
customer_reviews.author: brenda l.

customer_reviews.title: perfect soft side cooler
customer_reviews.text: We have a small hard sided YETI that we use on our RZR. I bought a new tire rack and it didn't fit anymore. This one with the slim design and zipper on the side work perfect. Keeps drinks cold all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy B

customer_reviews.title: Useful, attractive & handy!
customer_reviews.text: While keeping a pork roast frozen, I was easily able to carry this cooler (with additional cheese & meats) through the airport, and onto a family vacation.
customer_reviews.author: jcjones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a retirement party!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Yeti Cooler as a retirement gift for a coworker and love hearing from the recipient about the adventures he and his wife are bringing it on!
customer_reviews.author: CT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Well made - pricey
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended by family members - Well made but pricey in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Requate

customer_reviews.title: Junky cheap
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and doesn't keep cool at all. Get a 10 buck one from walmart
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I got this cooler because I was told it was the best cooler to buy, by all my friends. I bought it and I loves it so much I like to color and when I am traveling for Connecticut to Virginia everything stays cold and frozen. This was one of my best purchase on cooler!
customer_reviews.author: David Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as described
customer_reviews.text: I’m super disappointed and would love to return this cooler. Used it for the first time last week and it leaked and didn’t keep the ice for even a day!!! Feel like it was a huge waste of money. I’ve never written a bad review but this cooler was super expensive and didn’t deliver as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love YETI's
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger than I thought it would be, but it will last an all day trip
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love Yeti products! I’ve been wanting this bag for a while! Love it! Ice lasted in it for days at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke shortly after purchase
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after a few uses. Very expensive and not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Parra

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much we've hauled it up to Bear ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this in Lake Powell on our boat. Loved it so much we've hauled it up to Bear Lake. It's a fantastic cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: What the heck?!
customer_reviews.text: When we opened it, there was a strong ammonia smell which was overpowering. I closed it, boxed it up and sent it back. Immediately. Still baffled as to the cause.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: The amazing quality you expect
customer_reviews.text: My family uses this on a boat and it's perfect! It's the amazing quality you expect from the yeti brand. Awesome cooler bag for that all day cold beverage.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: Is there any kind of warranty on this product? We purchased it less than 2 years ago and the zipper has broken and we cannot close our cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and kept things cold!
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and works great on the beach in Florida. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: You'll wish you'd bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Our waters are always freezing cold on our fishing trips. We throw a small ice pack in and that's it. The zipper is a bit tough to unzip but a small price to pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a freakin Yeti! It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My go to cooler for the pool and BBQ. This keeps ice cool for days! Best cooler out there!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Omel

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel in airport!
customer_reviews.text: We used this to travel with breastmilk. It was a breeze!!! Highly reccommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and manageable
customer_reviews.text: Stellar product from yeti. I went with the hopper over a hard cooler to reduce weight and have more manageability. Expensive, yes, but you get what you pay for. Don’t cheat yourself, treat yourself. If your serious about camping or traveling this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my RV ing daughter. Expensive, but it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Baba T

customer_reviews.title: Best Father's Day gift ever.
customer_reviews.text: Travelled to the Turks and Caicos, salt cay via two plans and a boat. Kept our groceries frozen for two days! Easy to bring home whether you put it in your checked or use it as your carry on like my husband did.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kreis

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful Cooler. I fish very often and this is a great tool to my arsenal. Feels strong and looks like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: In true YETI fashion, this cooler bag is great! Much easier to tote around than the small YETI cooler as well. Keeps everything super cold. We live in south Louisiana, so the bag did sweat a good bit, but that's normal.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this cooler Zipper failed in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not by this cooler Zipper went bad in 6 months and yeti would not refund my money this is a bad product
customer_reviews.author: Kandra Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Love Yeti's products, and this is arguably their best one!
customer_reviews.author: Evrim

customer_reviews.title: Yeti
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I made this purchase got here early and made our campaign experience fun and having the yeti was like having a refrigerator with us I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Mbobby

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loved this bag. She researched and picked it out, and has used it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase with them and yeti cooler is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Beth coulter

customer_reviews.title: Zipper on my cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Yeti Hopper on March 18, 2018. The zipper broke this weekend. Hoping I can get a replacement or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fangman

customer_reviews.title: Great YETI - perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, perfect size for traveling to the beach and day trip. Lightweight so when filled still easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip and was extremely happy with it. Things stayed cool. Will buy another one to have 2.
customer_reviews.author: Tlw

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: YETI never disappoint me. It's more than I expected. Size is great, leak proof and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Itzsy

customer_reviews.title: It's a YETI!
customer_reviews.text: It's a YETI, you get what you pay for. Got it for a gift and they thank me every time it's used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending the extra $ for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Holds ice great. Zipper is a little tough for my wife
customer_reviews.author: Yancey Majchrowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great construction.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Looks great. We'll see about ice retention.
customer_reviews.author: Jjop

customer_reviews.title: Great day trip cooler, not for long trips.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say 100% waterproof, but overall it’s very sturdy and good quality! Keeps ice really well for any day trip. Possibly more depending on how often it’s opened.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Keisling

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Didn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Was for a Christmas present. Loved it! Didn’t disappoint. Arrived on time & it was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: zayda estevis

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed cooler great for 2-4 peoples drinks. Stays cold all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeti cooler
customer_reviews.text: Kept everything cold even until the next day! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was an awesome cooler. It rides in the tractor daily!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Harley TourPak Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I love the versatility of the Hopper and it's no leak zipper is perfect for transporting in the Harley TourPak.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Husbands Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: He cant get enough of it!! He is completely in love with this cooler. It fits so much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cooler for the beach. Holds ice well and it's not too clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Torralbes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with my Yeti Cooler. I go around my farm with my Yeti, even horseback ridding.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F Jaller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great soft sided cooler, should've ordered 30 quart is only regret.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: They are very good coolers I have five I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I take this cooler fishing with me on The boat and my drinks stay cold all day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zippers loose teeth
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. We have already lost 2 teeth from the zipper. It’s inexcusable
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ice melts too quick :(
customer_reviews.text: Durable and high quality material, but doesn’t hold ice as long as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JKnight

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold ice.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler does not hold ice for 24 hours. I will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Felber

customer_reviews.title: It was great til zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke tooo easily and its difficult to find a replacement zipper for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get into this cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is extremely difficult to get into and to keep open for loading/unloading. I wish I had not bought it,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't worked well for us. We fill it up with ice and beverages in the morning and by afternoon its melted.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed. My bf and I got this ice chest and have used it 3 times now for travel baseball tournaments. We fill it up in the morning with ice and a few beverages, and by afternoon evening its all melted and not staying cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a day at the beach or park
customer_reviews.text: Great for a day at the beach or park. Not too small. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I can’t wait to see my fiancé’s face at christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Of course great Yeti quality
customer_reviews.text: Of course great Yeti quality. Dummy me, though. Almost had a disaster. I read in the manual (hindsight) DO NOT put dry ice in this thing. Sent it in the mail as a present with some frozen meat and put dry ice in it. The cooler is so perfectly air tight, the dry ice evaporated and the gas almost ruined the cooler! Recipient said it looked like a tick about to explode when he opened the package. But all was well in the end. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: tmd1965

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice cool but I needed the 30 for better excess
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The zipper is very sturdy and still slides smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Items stay frozen nearly the whole weekend with 2 yeti 4lb ice blocks. However, the ice blocks do take up about 1/2 the space. After two summers of use, the handles are still very securely attached. The zipper is very sturdy and still slides smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Spritle

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is a little tough to open but I guess that means it’s keeping things cold inside
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: keep drinks ad foods cold under the beating heat in south carolina
customer_reviews.text: I use them to keep water soda and food cold. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and keeps beverages cold for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Fauvell

customer_reviews.title: Fully worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Given as a Christmas gift to my brother and he couldn't believe it! I had trouble letting go because the YETI really is incredible. Super durable and without a doubt something he'll have for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cooler does a good job keeping items cold all day. Liner in cooler does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Top quality. Leakproof. I look forward to using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised high-quality cooler convenient size great for games iand outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carry on bag?
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone tried using this as a carry on bag?
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It is a big bag
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use it all the time to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: David Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Originally sprung for the 30, but when we opened it up it was just too big for our desired level or portability (honestly while full I wouldn't even be able to carry it). The 20 is perfect, don't be afraid it is too small. Zipper is nice, sturdy and water tight. I don't even need to get into the yeti cold retention, because that is quite well documented. This is just a way to get that Yeti reliability in a more portable way
customer_reviews.author: Ciarra LusterTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Yeti is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I think all of the Yeti products are pretty amazing... This thing, despite it's price, is unbelievable! We can take it on the golf course in Arizona is the middle of summer and things are cold 36 holes later!
customer_reviews.author: BethyK

customer_reviews.title: Overrated, too expensive. Get a regular cooler.
customer_reviews.text: No better than a typical $40 cooler from Walmart or wherever. Doesn't nearly keep ice frozen for the days that it claims. Ice is melted in about 5 or 6 hours. Which may actually be worse performance than a typical cooler. Except this product is $300 and a regular cooler is 1/10th the price.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Caban

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag sat in car for 5 hours in palms springs and ice did not melt!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Price cheaper somewhere else!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, however, the next day the product’s price dropped.
customer_reviews.author: jorge ulloa

product_meta.title: YETI Hopper TWO Portable Cooler
feature_bullets: The YETI Hopper Two 20 is our ice-for-days portable cooler and is tough as nails so it can be hauled anywhere you want to take it
The updated design of the Hopper Two means your contents go in (and out) more easily
A tapered body makes extended hauling more comfortable
Features a waterproof DryHide Shell and nearly indestructible straps will stand up to an abundance of abuse in the field
HydroLok Zipper (a design borrowed from HazMat suits) is completely leakproof, eliminating spills and locking in cold

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
